name: Full Moon Kit
description:
Let's relax and enjoy a peaceful pool with various swimming animals!
You will receive a full kit that you can enjoy pool vacation! From the sky!





What kind of game is Full Moon Kit?

Spacing out and find refreshment with the swimming toy!
You can just watch out or control swimming animals.





What kind of fun is it?

You can relax and swim while controlling the toy freely.
Collect over 90+ animal friends!
You can ride a fountain and jumping board.





Meet the mysterious aurora.

Enjoy healing comfortably in a cool and beautiful swimming pool.
Hold your breath and love dive!
Enjoy your life with cute friends who splash and float!
